annonstext:
Monocl is a rapidly growing SaaS business focused on life sciences and healthcare. This is your chance to be a part of a journey where you can develop a product that will truly affect and transform the life science industry. We are now looking for a senior DevOps Engineer to join our Engineering team in Göteborg. Do you want to work with strategic upscaling of a highly sophisticated platform architecture with new users joining daily? Do you want to join a team where you will be surrounded by equally driven and creative colleagues? Then we would love to get to know you better!

 

Monocl’s mission is to connect all stakeholders in life sciences and healthcare through software - thereby enabling our customers to target and engage the right opinion leaders, medical experts, and customers anywhere in the world. We are guided by a strong vertical focus on life sciences and healthcare, combined with a relentless drive to address great customer challenges. We truly believe that software eats the world.

What you'll be doing:

You will be a core piece of our stellar R&D team and work on many of our most difficult DevOps challenges. Most of your time will be spent on improving our overall platform architecture, continuous deployment processes and our information security to ensure that we can grow faster and more reliably. You will be supporting on of our development teams with managing drift, automation and taking responsibility for the infrastructure. You will have the full support of your highly talented colleagues and be a senior member of the DevOps team, with the responsibility to:

- Automate processes and ensure operational stability

- Provide architectural guidance and implement improvements

- Provide information security guidance and implement improvements

- Educate and mentor other team members

Key parts of our tech stack of relevance for this position:

Linux

Networking

Security

AWS

Terraform

Docker

Kubernetes

Bash

Golang

GitLab

Ansible

GoCD

Who you are:

You need to have a genuine passion for DevOps and a desire to constantly improve yourself and others around you. You thrive working independently and with colleagues in smaller teams. You enjoy product-based businesses and you want to be a part of a rapidly expanding R&D team that is firing on all cylinders. We will provide you with these prerequisites.

To be successful, you will need at least 5 years of professional experience working with Linux/BSD. We also believe that you have relevant past experience working with cloud-based infrastructure and that you have experience from configuration management/CI/CD.

- You're not afraid to take initiatives

- You have an eye for details and take quality, security and stability very seriously

- You're a proven team player who is seen as humble and mentoring

Monocl Offers:

- We care about our employee's health and offer 4000 SEK/year in personal wellness grant

- Career and learning development through the platform and our 'Learn Anything' fund

- We're a sociable team with yearly kickoffs to get together and have fun!

Who are we

At Monocl we strongly believe in the strength of diversity and welcome applicants from all backgrounds. Here you will join an ambitious and international working environment with colleagues that push each other to the next level. You will enjoy a range of benefits and be equipped with great hardware for the job.

How do I apply?

This position will remain open as long as this ad remains on our website. When submitting your application, make sure to highlight and demonstrate past relevant achievements that you are proud of and make sure to include relevant references. We continuously look through applications. The applicants that best match our requirements will be contacted for a phone interview before a follow-up interview at our office. For questions (not applications) regarding the role, feel free to contact our Talent Acquisition Manager, Arsaman Bahrami, at  EMAIL  or  TELEPHONENO .
